subtitle.en: The project focused on enhancing the user experience for Genesi Laboratory Medicine, a company that stands out in providing accessible and high-quality diagnostic services.
subtitle.pt-br: O projeto focou em melhorar a experiência do usuário para a Genesi Medicina Laboratorial, uma empresa que se destaca em fornecer serviços de diagnóstico acessíveis e de alta qualidade.

myrole: As a UX/UI Designer, I was responsible for conducting the research and data analysis process to build an institutional website to promote the Genesi Laboratory. I held meetings with stakeholders, structured a benchmark, created solution prototypes, and defined metrics for future project improvements.
